thread.title: Lollu Sabha Jeeva attacks Jayalalitha niece J Deep for floating new party - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Lollu Sabha Jeeva attacks Jayalalitha niece J Deep for floating new party - Tamil Movie News

title: Lollu Sabha Jeeva attacks Jayalalitha niece J Deep for floating new party - Tamil Movie News
text: Music director attacks Vijayashanthi for supporting Chinamma Jayalalitha’s niece J. Deepa has made an announcement that she is floating a new party today on the occasion of the 69th birthday of her aunt, the departed former chief minister. A voice of dissent has come from a totally unexpected quarters. ‘Lollu Sabha’ Jeeva who has appeared in ‘Kuruvi’ and a few other films has openly criticized Deepa stating that since she wants her aunts immense properties and her political legacy she should also be ready to serve the imprisonment sentence of Jayalalitha. He has also made a strong point to her that the people of Tamil Nadu have been cheated for the past fifty years and right now they need a permanent and constructive rule. He finished by saying that Deepa’s selfish pity seeking politics is not needed by the people of Tamil Nadu.
